Reviews.Title: very good but need to set up
Reviews.Author: Gaston
Reviews.Content: Good camera. Poor auto focus when the zoom is high and the targets are in motion, but you can use configuration to fix it manually

Reviews.Title: Great kit!
Reviews.Author: Nicole K. Shaffer "Nikki"
Reviews.Content: Everything was great and as described! The camera holder isn't that big, but it works well to hold the camera, the charger, and an extra battery so I'm happy with it.

Reviews.Title: Nikon COOLPIX P520
Reviews.Author: Tomw
Reviews.Content: The camera is great. I used it to take photos of the moon one evening,I put the camera on a tripod and zoomed out as far as it would go. I aimed it at the moon, set it on self timer and and took photo. I was amazed at the clarity and detail f the moon. You can see the craters and mountains very well. Be sure to buy at least one extra battery as I ran out on one battery after 352 shots, however I did have to use various zoom settings which does draw power. Everything about the kit I ordered was good except the two tripods seem to be very cheap grade. Tripods drag while opening and closing.

Reviews.Title: great camera
Reviews.Author: PAT DEWITT
Reviews.Content: this is the 3rd one I have purchased, one for my wife ,then one for my sister, and this last one for my daughter , they all love them

Reviews.Title: Not what I was looking for
Reviews.Author: armySSGwife
Reviews.Content: Pictures turn out great...if the subject is not moving. This camera has some serious shutter lag which I couldn't work with. But the color is great.

Reviews.Title: Awesome!
Reviews.Author: Roberto Dos Santos
Reviews.Content: So far, i have nothing to complain. It's doing the job as expected.Great for someone that wants to get above a point and shoot camera and below a professional, loaded tech that will never be used.

Reviews.Title: Wow, No Answers & up $50
Reviews.Author: Ice
Reviews.Content: Wow, I was thinking about picking uip this package, but not only did they never answer any of my questions, but they just raised the price $50. Now the local stores around here, such as Walmart, Best Buy & even target have this camera with a package almost like this one for $379.00 - $449.00.One way to lose business...

ProductInfo.Features:
This Kit includes 11 items all with USA Warranty and manufacturer's supplied accessories
Nikon COOLPIX P520 18.1 MP CMOS Digital Camera with 42x Zoom NIKKOR ED Glass Lens and GPS Record Location (Red)
32 Gigabyte SDHC Secure Digital Memory Card - Secure Digital USB Card Reader - Universal Memory Card Wallet - Pack of LCD Screen Protectors
Additional EN-EL5 Rechargeable Lithium ion Replacement Battery - Protective Digital Camera Carrying Case with Pockets and Strap
Full Size 50" Tripod w/Case - Extendable Tabletop Mini Tripod - Lens Care & Cleaning Kit - HDMI Cable for direct connection to HDTV
ProductInfo.Name: Nikon COOLPIX P520 18.1 MP CMOS Digital Camera with 42x Zoom and "GPS" (Red) + EN-EL5 Battery + 9pc Bundle 32GB Deluxe Accessory Kit
